text: Which tool do you use to manage QR Code and save it inside HubSpot CRM ?

Hey HS,

General slack question, is there a custom code action channel available? I generally ask questions in the API chan, but if there is a CCA channel, that'd be better :slightly_smiling_face:
Hi guys, quick question - with HubSpot right now, we cannot create delays within their pipeline automations that take business days into account. Would it be possible to add this with custom code?

When attaching an apex (root) domain on CMS Enterprise I notice there's also a TXT record required. Does anybody know what this does and is it required or a nice to have? (Trying to keep things as simple as possible for my client if it's not needed)
yeah, you need Business Unit for that. I am using it for 10 brands in one portal. With business unit, you can have separate unsubscribe pages and subscription options.
I want to integrate the HubSpot API in the PHP is there any better document/SDK/Process to achieve this. I just want to add the customer information in HubSpot via PHP API
Can anyone help me out from this?
not sure if others have seen something similar, but we are close launching a client site and our search is returning nothing, even though there are pages published to the main domain

Hey <@U02PDLZTRPX>, is the site no-indexed before launch? If I remember correctly, that’ll block HubSpot’s site search, but there’s a robots.txt method described <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/seo/prevent-content-from-appearing-in-search-results|here> that’ll get around it.
looks like that may work. any idea how long it takes to reindex after the change?
How can I get the access token in HubSpot?
